page.title: 01RECREATIONAL FACILITIES.
page.content: Near the centre of Barnsley there is Locke Park. The park is usually very busy. It is in a quiet part of the town and is easily reached by bus. In the park there is a popular playground and a trim trail, cafe, bandstand and bowling green. Also in the town there is an art gallery, a modern library, a cinema, a small theatre and an old swimming baths. The town hall is in the very centre of Barnsley. It is a busy area with a variety of shops both modern and old. Many are in a newly landscaped pedestrian precinct. Surrounding the town are areas of mixed housing, small factories and land reclamation schemes designed to improve the image and facilities of Barnsley.
